item.title: About
item.description: Prerequisites # If you have decided to try our program, you need to have the following: Home server (or any computer with Debian Linux) Installation of Debian Linux Internet access

item.title: Installation
item.description: From your server’s command line, run the following command to install the programs required for NixMember: sudo apt install git bash After that, you need to download the program to your server: git clone https://github.com/nixmember/nixmember && cd nixmember And start the program: ./base.sh

item.title: Usage
item.description: When you start the program, you will be shown a language selection menu in which you can currently choose between Croatian, English and German. After selecting the language comes the option Setup - when you select Setup you are presented with our program database. Choose any program and install it with ease.
